description: This file defines the DeliveryHistoryScreen widget for a Flutter app, managing UI for delivery history with role-based access control and styled header and list items.

classes.name: DeliveryHistoryScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the delivery history screen, including role-based authorization and structured UI elements.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A stateless widget for rendering the styled header section of the delivery history page.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A stateless widget for rendering individual list items with icons and text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the DeliveryHistoryScreen, including role authorization and layout.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI for the _Header widget, including styling and iconography.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs each row with icon and text in the _Row widget.
